details: Created a centralized PowerShell linting script (.linting/lint.ps1) with flexible options
Added configuration files for all linting tools (.editorconfig, .flake8, .pylintrc, .pre-commit-config.yaml, pyproject.toml)
Created documentation for the linting system in .linting/README.md
Simplified the linting process, making it more efficient and user-friendly
Standardized code style and formatting across the project
Updated Memory Bank documentation with the new linting workflow
